---
name: Chore
about: Setup, refactor, or non-feature maintenance
labels: type:chore
---

## Description
What setup or maintenance task is being done?

## Tasks
- [ ] Make required changes
- [ ] Ensure nothing breaks
- [ ] Update configs/scripts
- [ ] Verify local + CI behavior

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Project builds successfully
- [ ] No behavior regressions
- [ ] Lint/tests pass

## Notes
Any relevant context.
